name: FC2動画　広告等不要物の完全除去　& 黒背景
description:
adblock & black

http://video.fc2.com/
http://video.fc2.com/ja/a/
アダルトも対応
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("video.fc2.com") {
.reco_wrap,
.recommend_v2 reco_live,
#hot_keyword,
#hot_tag,
#side_keyword,
[id*="footer"],
[class*="social"],
[id*="social"],
[href^="http://www.amazon.co.jp"],
.cmt_wrap,
form,
hr,
.ad_head_wide,
.side_menu_block strong,
#video_quality,
#video_title_quality,
#group_link,
.switch_player,
#notag_msg,
.video_control01,
.video_control02,
.video_control03,
.video_control04,
.video_control05,
.tag_caption,
.side_banner
{display: none !important;}

body{background: #000 !important;
     color: gray      !important;}
:link {color: pink !important;}
:visited {color: deeppink !important;}
}
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://video.fc2.com/a/content"),
               url-prefix("http://video.fc2.com/content"),
               url-prefix("http://video.fc2.com/ja/a/content"),
               url-prefix("http://video.fc2.com/ja/content"){
[target="_blank"],
.video_textad,
h4 + p,
.tag_edit,
h3
{display: none !important;}
}
